tutorials.title: Introduction to Oracle Machine Learning (OML) Notebooks
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Machine Learning Notebooks

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Projects and Workspaces in Oracle Machine Learning Notebooks
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to setup your Big Data Service environment before you can create clusters.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create and Run Notebooks in Oracle Machine Learning
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to create a BDS Highly Available (HA) Hadoop cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Collaborate in Oracle Machine Learning Notebooks
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to add Oracle Cloud SQL to your BDS cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Use the Scratchpad in Oracle Machine Learning Notebooks
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to map a node's private IP address to a public IP address
